page_text:
With a deep breath, Ember soared up high, 
Her wings so bright, they lit the sky. 
Petals danced in colors bold, 
A magical trail, a sight to behold. 
'Look at me!' Ember laughed with glee, 
'Flying's fun when you're brave and free!'
text_placement_suggestion: bottom of the page, below the illustration of Ember flying
